actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-514.

official_title: A bill to establish the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
short_title: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007

summary.text: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007 - Establishes the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in Illinois. Designates the Southern Illinois University Carbondale as the management entity for the Area.

titles.title: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007
A bill to establish the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
